welcome_inquiry.subject: Thank you for your photography inquiry - Jeff Honforloco
welcome_inquiry.html:
Thank You for Your Inquiry

Dear {{name}},

Thank you for reaching out about luxury photography services. I'm thrilled to learn about your vision and discuss how we can bring it to life through stunning photography.

What happens next:

  • I'll personally review your inquiry within 24 hours
  • You'll receive a detailed response with initial concepts
  • We'll schedule a complimentary consultation call
  • I'll provide a custom proposal tailored to your needs

In the meantime, feel free to explore my latest work in the portfolio section.

Looking forward to creating something extraordinary together!

Best regards,
Jeff Honforloco
Luxury Fashion & Beauty Photographer

This is an automated confirmation. I'll be in touch personally within 24 hours with a detailed response to your specific inquiry.

follow_up_24h.subject: Let's discuss your {{service}} project - Jeff Honforloco
follow_up_24h.html:
Ready to Move Forward?

Hi {{name}},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on your inquiry about {{service}} and share some initial thoughts about your project.

Based on your requirements, here's what I'm envisioning:

  • Custom lighting setup to match your brand aesthetic
  • Professional styling coordination
  • High-resolution images optimized for your intended use
  • Comprehensive post-production and retouching

I've attached a portfolio piece that aligns with your vision to give you a preview of the quality and style you can expect.

Next Steps:

I'd love to schedule a 30-minute consultation call to discuss your project in detail and answer any questions you might have. Are you available this week for a brief conversation?

You can reply to this email or call me directly at +646-379-4237.

Best regards,
Jeff Honforloco

follow_up_3d.subject: Exclusive offer for {{location}} photography - Jeff Honforloco
follow_up_3d.html:
Limited Time: Exclusive {{location}} Package

Dear {{name}},

I hope you're still considering luxury photography for your upcoming project. I wanted to reach out with an exclusive opportunity that might interest you.

This month only, I'm offering a special {{location}} photography package that includes:

  • Complimentary location scouting
  • Extended shooting time (up to 8 hours)
  • Same-day preview gallery
  • Rush delivery within 48 hours
  • Bonus: Professional styling consultation

Save 15% on Your First Project

Valid through the end of this month

This exclusive offer is perfect for clients who value exceptional quality and want to secure premium dates for their photography needs.

Ready to claim your spot?

Reply to this email or call +646-379-4237 to discuss your project and secure this limited-time offer.

Best regards,
Jeff Honforloco

follow_up_7d.subject: Don't miss out - Limited calendar availability - Jeff Honforloco
follow_up_7d.html:
Final Notice: Limited Calendar Spots Remaining

Hi {{name}},

I noticed you haven't had a chance to schedule our consultation call yet, and I wanted to give you a heads up about my availability.

‚ö†Ô∏è Limited Spots Available: I only accept a select number of projects each month to ensure every client receives personalized attention and exceptional results.

Currently booking for:

  • March 2025 - 2 spots remaining
  • April 2025 - 3 spots remaining
  • May 2025 - Now accepting bookings

If you're still interested in discussing your photography project, I encourage you to reach out soon to secure your preferred dates.

What my clients say:

- Recent Client

If this isn't the right time for your project, no worries at all! Feel free to reach out when you're ready.

Otherwise, I'd love to chat about your vision. You can reply here or call +646-379-4237.

Best regards,
Jeff Honforloco
